nodes.text: R2-D60 was an R2-series astromech droid that was a spy for the Rebel Alliance, but worked on Coruscant serving various members of the Imperial Senate. He was a typical R2 but had an unusual, frosted dome, and included a Burtt acoustic signaller.
This droid was a toy made available exclusively at Disney Parks beginning on May 22, 2015 in honor of Disneyland's sixtieth anniversary.
